comments.body: Enchantments are an in-game mechanic, not an out of game concern about Minecraft in general, so moving to Gameplay.
Yes but she likes taming all of the animals.
Actually, the wild ocelots are very fierce, they are not suitable for being a pet, you can tame a cat, it's meek
Logically, we also no longer needed to tame wolves. This is a very strange and very stupid thing. Besides, ocelots are useless now.

I noticed Minecraft is very concerned with conservation right now, which is also why dolphis arent tamable and why the bee update was even added in the first place. In real life you couldnt go up to an ocelot/lion/other big cat and tame it, which is why they removed it.
New game mode suggestion, moving accordingly.

This should not be a new gamemode this should be a part of peaceful.
Food is almost useless in peaceful.
This will be great. My dad who plays with me hates hostile mobs.
Yes this would be very good since I have created a city and I want to roll play but can‚Äôt because mobs spawn everywhere. But I also want to get hungry to add a little realism. This is a great idea.
Perhaps water aspect V could be like frost Walker but instead of freezing the water it would part it
Call it "Frostbite"
How about for the rest of the nether
I would prefer such and effect via a potion.
I don't understand how that is an improvement to fishing, sorry.
Neither does the original poster, as evidenced by his/her last sentence.
I think if the player hooks any solid block, it should pull the player.
First of all, I agree with Bilbo (love the name), and second of all, IDK meant that the rest was up to Mojang (sorry, I was unclear).
YES YES YES YES!!! Hardcore players would love this, especially because Hardcore mode is coming to Bedrock.
Why was this not just part of the first Minecraft for Windows 10 release?
There should be another advancement called "I am the Storm" that comes after... I don't know how you'd get it but it would be funny and cool at the same time.
New idea about pattern for armor "Breeze", decoration for armor, which will be in the chest in the Breeze dungeon.

I have a cool idea, I don't know if you will like it or not, and the idea itself is the design of a village from cherry blocks, (if you need a screenshot, write to me on xbox "userolegb") I survived in my world, and I saw many villages, for example: village in the desert, a village in the winter biome, and you can add a village of cherry blocks on the cherry biome, I will send you the design (tell me where) you can also make the inhabitants under the cherry biome (you will do the design of the inhabitants yourself) thank you if you listened to me :) if I something that's not how I write it from the translator

I would like Minecraft to have normal optimization. Minecraft is terribly unoptimized and even on powerful PCs it works poorly. Players suffer with mods like optifine or sodium. Therefore, it would be better to add optimization.
Please add some wall redstone.

I think many people would like to see icicles added. There are stalactites and stalagmites, so why not make them icy? That would be cool! It would also be great if icicles could appear on residents' houses and trees, with the possibility of falling on players when they walk nearby. Who supports the idea of icicles?üòä
You can add 3 more cat colors: Brown with bright eyes, bald, and white with black spots. I hope the community accepts this.
Just saying it will not light up around you because that is a feature of a mod called "Optifine" on Java edition.
this is parity
This has already been announced for the combat update v2, so just wait around until then.
Yes me too ,that will allow player to see nearby things
Pls pls introduce this ... Also tameable items should be allowed in off hand such as wheat,potato,seagrass etc.
That's why I made this to help the growth and the tictok to help the growth of this movemet
i know right its just a common want
Like mobs not respawning while in a boat
And banners on shields

These would be cool, but a whole update focused on them? nah.
Could better be a ambience update in general. Where ambient animals and changes would be added.
I'm fine with this idea so long as the weather and seasons are independently controlled by configuration settings.
Yeah and maybe for 1.18
you could also add netherite scraps to it and make netherite arrows which not only do high damage but also the wither effect.
great idea

I believe they should get more use, but TNT arrows?!?!? That's like giving a grenade launcher to griefers, I understand fletching tables need more use, but that would ruin minecraft pvp forever, as well as building. If you want, download a mod.
no it only explodes when it hits an entity so its not like launching TNT

and also the bundle! i think you should be able to edit the reload speed, power, and accuracy of bows and crossbows, craft tipped arrows, and create iron arrows, gold arrows, diamond arrows, and netherite arrows. each level, going up, would have a significant change in damage, but their accuracy would get lower. and you should be able to have lightning arrows. you could either use a copper arrow or get a channeling or enchantment like channeling on your bows and crossbows. and also you should be able to hold bundles in your off-hand in bedrock.
Hi

I agree.

I Have been hoping and looking from time to time for this update since summer.

My son and I play together but are not able to play with any of my friends or his friends while both playing together.

Would really love to see this in the next update or dlc.
I agree, please add this feature. It is a great feature in regular Minecraft.
I wish they would add this to the game
I like the idea of customizable appearance
Yes, perfect
Same for cobbled deepslate being made out of deepslate!
I'm not sure about moving ships but there could be a boat structure that resembles a Pillager Outpost on the water
Great idea but I think we would need ww1 and ww2 dreadnoughts and battleships with other warships for both sides

Crystal pvp is another branch of pvp in Minecraft. A large community favors the "op"ness of end crystals because it adds different strategies to pvp. If it has changed a server you play on for the worse, just ask the owner to install a plugin that nerfs end crystals.

just to let you know crystal pvp is not unfair all you have to do is make sure your enemy never gets the low ground there's plenty of ways to counter it plus hit crystaling is quite hard to learn and what's even harder is butterfly crystaling so i believe what you meant to say is I need to get better at the game

I think that the overall mechanics should be changed, because crystal pvp it's not very interesting...
I think that it needs to change how explosion damage work, based on overall exposure, instead of just legs exposure, so it's still viable to do crystal pvp, but the attacker wil also receive damage, since, you still get hurt if something explodes near you, face or legs
I feel like crystals need to be nerfed they were never mean't to be tampered with for pvp. Also I don't feel like spamming crystals and changing totems is a fun way of pvp.
Don't listen to the sweaty kids in the comment, you are completely correct that crystal should be nerfed.
THIS WOULD BE FANTASTIC, IMAGINE THE THINGS THAT COULD HAPPEN WITH THE SWITCH'S MOTION CONTROL
Its a good idea
It would be better if you use this vr controls with any switch VRs!
This should be a feature especially for the labo kit. I can think of so many ways they can add this to nintendo switch.
let nintindo switch have vr please
haha cool idea I hope they do this
Love this idea
I don't get it. I'm going to signal the context crew.

That would be turning an effective 140 seconds into 300 seconds, though, since you get 3 fire charges from one coal (80 seconds) and one blaze powder (which you get two of from the 120 second blaze rod).
Then it should be 46.66 seconds per fire charge. Problem solved!
396386292072 rounding up to 50 would be fine too. I just meant to point out out the extreme jump in fuel efficiency.
Better if it was 75~ seconds per fire charge. That will make fire charges a good nether fuel and will be more valuable than smeltable ingredients with gunpowder
Perhaps something like "Fogpiercer"?
Just make it a game option.  Make nether fog attached to render distance or simulation distance.

I wish looking through a spyglass would let you see through the fog. I honestly have a terrible time finding fortresses after the update. Biomes are awesome but I wish I could I could actually see them instead of a murky fog in the entire dimension. Or having treasure maps in ruined portal chests to reveal the location of nether fortresses would also be a huge improvement.
Yeah they need to add this.
Also like placing torches with the left hand while mining with the right or eating with the left hand in bedrock
